OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHURCHES COUNCIL FOR COMMUNITY CARE ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY SCHEME

Desc.entry: A registered charity which has been set up to help people aged 60 years and over who have been taken to the Accident and Emergency Department and who do not require hospital admission. Accompanies the patient and helps them settle back at home. The scheme operates from 6am to 9pm in the evening, 7 days a week including bank holidays. Referrals to this scheme come from hospital professionals only.
